vikipediText: The singer, who created a music style of his listeners and music writers with his first album, had various unrest in musical sense by questioning his existing works after his third album Aşk Women's Spirit (2004).His dissatisfaction with his songs led him to turn to a different style of words and music from his previous works.He prepared a large part of this album with Erdem Kınay and Mete Özgencil, whom he had worked in a few songs before, and this musicians played a significant role in the development of the album.
